page.title: 01MY LEISURE TIME (I)
page.content: In some of my spare time,I watch television.I don't really have a particular channel which I watch because I think they are all quite good.I watch telly for about 3 hours each night.As soon as I get in from school,I put the telly on,then it stays on for the rest of the night.Our telly Is a colour telly and I'm glad because it is more interesting than black/white.Most people watch telly because they get bored,and have nothing to do or nowhere to go.I enjoy reading.Iread every night before I go to bed,because it helps me to get tired so that I can go to sleep.I read comics and annuals because I think they are funny and amusing.I also like to do some sports.I do some running but I like to do hockey the most.My hobbies are knitting and swimming.I do these when I have nothing else to do.
